thread.title: Banjo & Matilda, Inc. Enters into an Agreement to Acquire Spectrum King LED

author: cnbc.com
title: Banjo & Matilda, Inc. Enters into an Agreement to Acquire Spectrum King LED
text:
LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Banjo & Matilda, Inc (OTC: BANJ) (“BANJ”) announced today that it has entered into an agreement to acquire Spectrum King LED (“SKLED”), the world’s premier full spectrum LED grow lighting technology.
“Spectrum King LED has a compelling story to share with the public. We developed a proven technology that has been very well received and we believe that this transaction positions the company to maximize shareholder value, especially with the favourable outlook for the sectors that we serve. Our transformative suite of cutting-edge LED solutions are ready for the next level of expansion and accessing the market should enhance Spectrum King’s business model, by accelerating our production and market expansion,” stated Rami Vardi, SKLED’s Founder and CEO.
Further details of the transaction are available in the recently filed 8-K.
About Spectrum King LED
As the premier LED grow light tech company, Spectrum King LED (“SKLED”) specializes in designing, manufacturing and selling full-spectrum LED grow lights (currently patent pending), for indoor and greenhouse applications, targeting a number of grow industries.
SKLED’s powerful advantages include innovative LED grow lights that are designed to mimic natural outdoor sunlight to help your plants grow healthier and yield better harvests, more consistently, with quality and intensity of light that they are accustomed to from natural sunlight, and at a lower cost than outdoor growing.
For further information on SKLED, please go to www.spectrumkingled.com
Forward looking Statement
